TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientRoleProvider extends System.Web.Security.RoleProvider

summary.span: 从 Microsoft Ajax 角色服务中获取基于 Windows 的应用程序的角色信息。

span.span: Gets role information for Windows-based applications from an Microsoft Ajax roles service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过配置应用程序以使用现有的角色服务从检索角色信息类。You can use client application services to retrieve role information from an existing roles service by configuring your application to use the class. 完成配置后，您可以确定身份验证的用户是否属于特定角色通过调用方法返回的`static`属性。After configuration, you can determine whether an authenticated user is in a particular role by calling the method of the returned by the `static` property. 对于配置为使用客户端应用程序服务的应用程序，此属性会返回 。For applications configured to use client application services, this property returns a . 因为此类实现 接口，所以无需显式引用它。Because this class implements the interface, you do not need to reference it explicitly. 方法在内部调用方法。The method internally calls the method. 类是只读的角色成员资格提供程序所指示的角色服务从检索身份验证的用户的角色信息属性。The class is a read-only role membership provider that retrieves role information for authenticated users from the roles service indicated by the property. 值通常从应用程序配置文件以及其他配置值检索属性。The value of the property is typically retrieved from the application configuration file along with other configuration values. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 您可以检索当前实例通过`static`属性。You can retrieve the current instance through the `static` property. 类仅支持并方法的抽象类。The class supports only the and methods of the abstract class. 当对于特定用户调用这些方法之一时，服务提供程序将首先检查角色信息的本地数据缓存。When you call one of these methods for a particular user, the service provider first checks the local data cache for role information. 如果缓存不包含角色的任何信息或缓存已过期，服务提供程序将从角色服务中检索角色信息，并将其添加到缓存。If the cache does not contain any role information or the cache has expired, the service provider retrieves the role information from the roles service and adds it to the cache. 在配置客户端应用程序服务时，可以指定角色缓存的超时期限。You can specify the time-out period for the roles cache when you configure client application services. 若要强制方法来检索角色的数据而不是本地缓存中，调用该服务从方法第一个。To force the method to retrieve role data from the service instead of the local cache, call the method first. 不能使用类创建或删除角色，或修改用户角色成员身份。You cannot use the class to create or delete roles, or to modify the role membership of users. 若要创建或修改角色的信息，必须更改服务器上的角色服务的配置。To create or modify role information, you must change the configuration of the role service on the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性以编程方式设置这些角色服务位置。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to programmatically set the roles service location. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#302](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#302)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#302](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#302)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override string[] GetRolesForUser (string username);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string[] GetRolesForUser(string username) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetRolesForUser (username As String) As String()
public: override cli::array <System::String ^> ^ GetRolesForUser(System::String ^ username);
override this.GetRolesForUser : string -> string[]

param.name: username
param.span: 要检索其角色的用户的名称。

span.span: The name of the user to retrieve roles for.

summary.span: 获取指定用户所属的角色的名称。

span.span: Gets the names of the roles that the specified user belongs to.

returns.span: 所属的角色名称；如果用户未通过身份验证，则为一个空数组。

span.span: The role names that belongs to or an empty array if the user is not authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索当前已经过身份验证的用户，必须在中指定的角色信息`username`参数。The method retrieves role information for the current, authenticated user, which you must specify in the `username` parameter. 您可以通过获取用户名称`static`属性，如下所示： `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.Name`。You can get the user name through the `static` property as follows: `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.Name`. 服务提供程序缓存有关本地文件系统，从而避免不必要的服务调用的角色信息。The service provider caches role information about the local file system to avoid unnecessary service calls. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法来确定测试角色成员身份之前是否已过期的用户登录名。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to determine whether the user login has expired before testing role membership. 此代码假定所有有效用户都与一个或多个角色关联。This code assumes that all valid users are associated with one or more roles. 在这种情况下，方法不会返回以前经过身份验证的用户的登录名已过期的任何角色。In this case, the method will not return any roles for a previously-authenticated user whose login has expired. 如果用户登录名已过期，此代码将显示登录对话框。If the user login has expired, this code displays the login dialog box. 否则，它会调用方法，以确定用户是否属于"管理员"角色。Otherwise, it calls the method to determine whether the user is in the "manager" role. 受限制的代码位于`PerformManagerTask`方法，则不会。The restricted code is in a `PerformManagerTask` method, which is not provided. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#321](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#321)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#321](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#321)]

exception.span: 不是当前通过身份验证的用户的用户名。

span.span: is not the user name of the current, authenticated user.

span.span: The friendly name of the provider.

param.name: config
param.span: 名称/值对的集合，表示在配置中为该提供程序指定的、特定于提供程序的特性。

span.span: A collection of name/value pairs representing the provider-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]扩展性模型调用方法来初始化在应用程序配置文件中使用的信息。The [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] extensibility model calls the method to initialize the using information in your application configuration file. 此方法可以识别以下角色服务配置属性：This method recognizes the following role service configuration attributes: - `name` - `description` - `cacheTimeout` - `connectionStringName` - `serviceUri` - `honorCookieExpiry` 有关这些属性的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information about these attributes, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md).

exception.span: 包含的 cacheTimeout 值格式不正确，无法转换为 值。

span.span: contains a cacheTimeout value that is not in the correct format for conversion to an value.

exception.span: 包含的 cacheTimeout 值用于表示小于 或大于 的数。

span.span: contains a cacheTimeout value that represents a number less than or greater than .

related.span: 如何：配置客户端应用程序服务

summary.span: 获取一个指示指定用户是否属于指定角色的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified user is in the specified role.

returns.span: 如果指定用户处于指定的角色，则为 ；如果指定用户未通过身份验证或者不处于指定的角色，则为 。

span.span: if the specified user is in the specified role; if the specified user is not authenticated or is not in the specified role.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以确定身份验证的用户是否属于特定角色通过调用方法返回的`static`属性。You can determine whether an authenticated user is in a particular role by calling the method of the returned by the `static` property. 对于配置为使用客户端应用程序服务的应用程序，此属性会返回 。For applications configured to use client application services, this property returns a . 因为此类实现 接口，所以无需显式引用它。Because this class implements the interface, you do not need to reference it explicitly. 方法在内部调用方法。The method internally calls the method. 方法使用方法，以确定用户是否由指示`username`属于由角色`roleName`。The method uses the method to determine whether the user indicated by `username` is in the role indicated by `roleName`. 服务提供程序缓存有关本地文件系统，从而避免不必要的服务调用的角色信息。The service provider caches role information about the local file system to avoid unnecessary service calls. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问此方法直接以确定用户是否属于特定角色。The following example code demonstrates how to access this method directly to determine whether the user is in a particular role. 此代码首先测试是否已过期的用户登录名。This code first tests whether the user login has expired. 使用显式调用所需的引用方法，因此可以用相同的引用来调用方法。An explicit reference is required to call the method, so the same reference is used to call the method. 如果用户是"管理员"角色中，此代码将调用`PerformManagerTask`方法，则不会。If the user is in the "manager" role, this code calls a `PerformManagerTask` method, which is not provided. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#321](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#321)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#321](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#321)]

exception.span: 不是当前通过身份验证的用户的用户名。

span.span: is not the user name of the current, authenticated user.

exception.span: 用户不再是通过身份验证的用户。

span.span: The user is no longer authenticated.
The roles service is not available.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ResetCache ();
.method public hidebysig instance void ResetCache() cil managed
Public Sub ResetCache ()
public: void ResetCache();
member this.ResetCache : unit -> unit

summary.span: 清除缓存的角色信息并重置缓存的超时期限。

span.span: Clears the cached role information and resets the cache time-out period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从本地缓存中删除角色的所有信息，并会导致缓存过期。The method removes all role information from the local cache and causes the cache to expire. 调用此方法后，在下一次调用到或方法将从配置的角色服务而不是本地缓存中检索角色信息。After you call this method, your next call to the or method will retrieve role information from the configured role service instead of the local cache. 此方法可用于使用户能够具有更改其角色，但尚未过期缓存刷新角色缓存。You can use this method to enable users to refresh the roles cache when their role has changed but the cache has not yet expired. 有关如何设置角色缓存超时间隔的信息，请参阅[如何： 配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For information about how to set the roles cache time-out interval, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法以重置本地角色缓存。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to reset the local roles cache. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#314](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#314)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#314](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#314)]

related.span: 如何：配置客户端应用程序服务

MemberSignature.Value: public string ServiceUri { get; set; }

Public Property ServiceUri As String

member this.ServiceUri : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置角色服务的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the URI of the role service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以设置属性在应用程序代码中，但你通常将应用程序配置文件中设置值。You can set the property in your application code, but you will typically set the value in your application configuration file. 这使您无需重新编译你的代码更改的服务位置。This enables you to change the service location without recompiling your code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 当以编程方式设置服务位置时，必须指定完整的服务 URI，它将始终以"Role_JSON_AppService.axd"结尾。When you set the service location programmatically, you must specify the complete service URI, which will always end with "Role_JSON_AppService.axd". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性以编程方式设置这些角色服务位置。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to programmatically set the roles service location. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#302](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#302)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#302](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#302)]

exception.span: 获取此属性时，未在应用程序配置文件中发现任何服务 URI，并且以前未设置过此属性。

span.span: When getting this property, no service URI was found in the application configuration file, and this property has not been previously set.

related.span: 如何：配置客户端应用程序服务
